Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lake Shore Drive/47th
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, Oakwood & Lake Shore Dr: due to, street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, Oakwood and Lake Shore Drive: due to, street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/47th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Delays on Loop 'L' (elevated lines)
ShortDescription: Brown, Green, Orange & Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown, Green, Orange and Pink Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Ave/Clark
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding, Eastbound 72 North Ave buses will only provide service up to North Ave/Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding, Eastbound #72 North buses will only provide service up to North Ave/Clark.

Please allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Service is temporarily only going as far as 35th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Eastbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily only going as far as 35th/Cottage Grove. Westbound buses begin at 35th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily only going as far as 35th/Cottage Grove due to heavy traffic and crowding.

Westbound buses begin at 35th/Cottage Grove.

Please allow extra travel time.
